/* hue, saturation, and lightness */          
:root {
  accent-color: hsl(174 38% 64%);
}

/* lightness, chroma, and hue */
input[type="checkbox"] {
  accent-color: oklch(0.769 0.092 187);
}

input[type="radio"] {
  accent-color: #67c7be;
}

input[type="range"] {
  accent-color: rgb(103 199 190);
}

progress {
  accent-color: DarkTurquoise;
}
